#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        string s1, s2; cin>>s1>>s2;
        int a[150]={0}, b[150]={0};
        if(s1.length()!=s2.length()){cout<<"NO\n"; continue;}
        for(int i=0;i<s1.length();i++){
            a[int(s1[i])]++;
            b[int(s2[i])]++;
        }
        int status=1;
        for(int i=0;i<150;i++){
            if(a[i]!=b[i]) status=0;
        }
        if(status==1) cout<<"YES"<<endl; else cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
